alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL LANCASTER AND CENTRAL YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over York, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... York, Weigelstown, Elizabethtown, Columbia, Mount Joy, Red Lion, Spry, Dallastown, Shiloh, East York, Stonybrook-Wilshire, West York, Maytown, Grantley, Tyler Run-Queens Gate, Valley View, Manchester, Hallam, Emigsville and Marietta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
